layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.body.p:87-3
layer_sequence_get_headdir: With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current playhead direction, which will be one of the constants listed below.

layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
layer_sequence_get_headdir: The unique ID value of the sequence element to target

layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:116-9
layer_sequence_get_headdir: The sequence is playing frames in an incremental order from left to right

layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.head: layer_sequence_get_headdir.htm+html.body.p:131-3
layer_sequence_get_headdir: The above code checks the the current playhead direction of the sequence element ID stored in the variable "title_sequence", and if it's not set to <tt>seq_dir_left</tt>, it is set to this value.
